price: 174. Iš tiesų, tame tikrai yra ženklas, tačiau dauguma jų nėra tikintys,
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
